CustomField.description: Field to store the Import List source - e.g. Axiom. Validation allows changes from empty to a value. But once a value is provided, validation will prevent changes to another value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to store the Import List source - e.g. Axiom. Passed from Lead Conversion. Note once a value is provided, it cannot be changed.
CustomField.label: Lead Source Detail
